Name: Notice for the installation of bioswales, rain gardens, or other bioretention systems.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to notice for the installation of bioswales, rain gardens, or other bioretention systems
BodyName: Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Environmental Protection and Waterfronts

Summary: This bill would require the Department of Environmental Protection (DEP) to notify the local Council Member when DEP installs a new bioswale, rain garden, or other bioretention system in the public right-of-way.
